collection.description: Describes whether a collection is considered a core set or special set

product.name: Search product boosts
product.description: List of search queries for which a product gets higher rank in search results

product.name: Related products
product.description: List of related products

product.name: Related products settings
product.description: Determines how related products are displayed along with algorithmic product recommendations

product.name: Complementary products
product.description: List of complementary products

product.name: Color
product.description: Defines the primary color or pattern, such as blue or striped

product.name: Theme
product.description: Describes the product's primary theme or motif, such as sport, space, or holidays

product.name: Recommended age group
product.description: Identifies the suitable age range for a product, typically toys and games; e.g. babies, teens

product.name: Toy/Game material
product.description: Identifies the main material used in a toy or game, such as plastic or wood

product.name: Card attributes
product.description: Describes special features of collectible trading cards, like foil or holographic

product.name: Rarity
product.description: Specifies the uniqueness of items, typically for collectibles; e.g. limited edition, ultra rare

product.name: Trading card packaging
product.description: Identifies how trading cards are packaged, such as blister pack or booster pack

product.name: booster_pack_selection
product.description: A list describing the booster pack types in the product

product.name: booster_pack_count
product.description: Quantity of booster packs in a product

product.name: rrp
product.description: Recommended retail price

product.name: is_preorder
product.description: Defines whether a product is a pre-order

product.name: preorder_estimated_date
product.description: Estimated shipping date for pre-order items

product.name: is_restock
product.description: Defines whether an out of stock product has an upcoming restock

product.name: restock_estimated_arrival_date
product.description: The date that restock products are estimated to arrive with the business

product.name: is_delayed
product.description: Defines whether a product is expected to arrive after the advertised release date

product.name: delay_estimated_arrival
product.description: The date which delayed stock is expected to arrive with the business

product.name: delay_reason
product.description: A brief customer-friendly description of the reason for stock delays
